org.smtlib.impl

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smtlib.impl.Factory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExpr.IFactory, ISort.IFactory

    public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExpr.IFactory, ISort.IFactory
    Implements a factory for SMT-LIB expressions using the standard concrete syntax. Instances of these IExpr objects have an IPos element. The various factories are all implemented together in this one class because they use each other mutually; combining them lets them be overridden in a consistent fashion.

      • setPos

        <T extends IPos.IPosable> T setPos(IPos pos,
                                 T t)
        Sets the text position for a given instance. This is a template so it can return its receiver object without the type changing.
